You are in a state of shock as you realize there is a real chance you might be pregnant.

"Misty? Misty? Are you OK?" Ms Klein asks looking at you with concern.

Snapping back to reality you come up with a plan as you look up at Ms. Klein through the tears in your eyes. You are amazed at how fast Misty's rapid fire brain works. If the plan works you can get answers from the real Misty and save your job if there is any negative fallout from the parking lot.
The problem is you can't even talk, you are crying and sniffling so bad, it is embarrassing. You try to wipe the tears flowing down your cheeks with your hand. Now to get Ms Klein to take you home, take her to the shed and switch places with her. It takes all you effort to compose yourself to ask, "Can you bring me to my house quick so I can get cleaned up? I'm not feeling well and Kyle was my ride. It's not that far, but would take me to long to walk and get back in time."
Ms Klein has a frustrated look on her face, but quickly nods. Taking a tissue from the box on Ms. Klein's desk you wipe your eyes and the tears off your cheeks. You can't believe she is helping you out so much. She would have fired the real you, Emily or Samantha in a heart beat for any infraction back in the day. What does she see in you?
Turning you hear the click as Ms Klein hangs up the desk phone after talking to one of the other librarians at the front desk. She picks up her purse and pulls out here keys. Smiling at you she says, "Lets go Misty. We have to hurry."
Following her to the parking lot, you are impressed with her car. How can a librarian afford a car like this, she must have a sugar daddy. Opened her door Ms Klein throws down a sweat shirt she had laying in the back seat onto the passenger seat. Sitting down you can't believe how plush and comfortable this seat is. you could get used to this. As you buckle up you tell Ms Klein your address. "Yes, I know Ms. Davis, I live up the road from you."
Wow she lives in the huge house next to you, where Rebecca Johnson's lives in the future.
A short drive later she pulls up into your yard. "Be quick Misty," Ms Klein says to you as she looks into her mirror to check her makeup. You climb out of the car and point to the shed, "Ms Klein come with me quick!"
Ms Klein follows you, concerned something is wrong. Amazingly she moves pretty fast for someone in heels and enters into the shed right behind you. She looks around at all the equipment and opens one of the notebooks on the table and begins skimming through it as she asks,
"What is this Misty?"
"Please Sit in that pod Ms. Klein, its a body switching machine."
Ms. Klein starts laughing and sits down in the pod, "You have one over active imagination, Ms. Davis. We have to hurry! We don't have time to get caught up in you little girl fanta...."
Hitting the button in your pod you cut off Ms Klein conversation as the doors slam shut and a brilliant light surrounds you. It feels like your floating in the light. Everything feels right at first, but then Something feels wrong. It feels like a strong dry wind is blowing you, but for some reason you aren't flowing towards your new body like before. It feels like you are being ripped apart as the dry wind and light increase in intensity. Pieces of you seem to go be carried by this wind, but feels like great portions of you are falling back into Misty's body. You feel like a puzzle with pieces falling away. It feels like Ms Klein flowing through you as she travels towards Misty's body. Its like you are her, part of her, almost one as she passes through you into your body. Something is very wrong. When she passed through you it's like she took most of what was left of you back into Misty's body. Its like you are a thread now being pulled in two direction as you unravel. You are getting thinner and thinner as you fall apart, you try and scream but nothing comes out. It feels like you are so thin you are going to break. Then everything fades away.

You open your eyes and you fall out of the pod. You try and react, but your thoughts aren't there. Your body doesn't seem to work. It is like you are a shard of tapestry thrown over another. The other tapestry fills all the missing spaces. Trying to breath, its like you aren't part of this body, like you are unplugged. It's like you are drowning. You manage to gasp and feel air fill your lungs. You are starting to feel sensations again. Your head is pounding and if filled with thoughts that aren't your own.

Your head feels like its pulsating and burning, you look at Misty dancing and twirling in front of a mirror with the notebook in her hand. She is such a beautiful girl, such a hard worker and so smart. How you have fantasized she was your daughter. Oh my is she twerking..... OUCH your hair pins are red hot in your hair. quickly you pull them out.
Your long thick blond hair falls around your shoulders as you stand up.

Your are not sure how long you have been out.
"Misty what was that?" you ask holding your head.

A confused Misty turns around and looks at you. "That's your body switching machine Ms. Klei...Misty...Oh my I almost called you Ms. Klein." She puts down the notebook and twirls again with her hang clasped together under her chin. She is so excited. "Can we stay this way for awhile. This is so wonderful. I can't believe this." She is jumping and skipping around. She has so much energy. I wish I had that energy.

You find yourself wishing you were her. She has a glow about her. A beautiful teenage girl in trouble, but so happy, so care free. A handsome boyfriend. You think back to when you were her age. You actually were dating her boyfriends father. He looked just like him, he was so sweet and shy, but from the wrong side of the tracks. Your family never approved of him. Sometimes you fantasize what life would have been like if you followed your heart, lets face it you would have had to struggle. It wouldn't have been easy especially since your family controlled most of the towns industries. Your family would have punished you for marrying beneath you. Instead you have had two loveless marriages. The first left you barren when you first husband cheated on you and left you with a disease. They were able to cure you, but the scarring kept you from easily having children. Right after your second marriage Misty's father offered Misty to you to adopt as a baby, you were thrilled it was an answer to you prayers, but then your second husband left you for his secretary. Your parents forbid you to adopt her. A single mother would not be proper. You did manage to convince to finance his projects. After that you always felt like love is not real and you will never find it again. You were so depressed, your parents built the house up the way to watch over the little girl. You watched her from afar, but could never be part of her life.

Tears come to your eyes It is so wonderful looking at her it reminds you of the happiest time of your life, before your marriages. How you felt as a teenage girl in love when everything seemed possible. Thinking back you secretly wished Kyle's father had made you pregnant with a daughter. How you could have been her best friend, combed her hair like your mother did in the morning as your talked about dreams, books and hopes for the day. Shaking your head you think what a silly fantasy.

"Ms Davis you have to get ready, we don't have all day," you remind Misty. Your head is pounding so hard you can hardly think. Misty leads you to the house she quickly showers and comes out with a cute outfit. It looks like one you would pick, she has very good taste. She has the notebook from the shed under her arm and a comb in her hand. "Could you come with me and comb my hair,"
Your shocked that she would ask almost a complete stranger to comb her hair, but you are so touched and excited that she asked you. "Yes, Misty, I could help you with your hair." Oh my I hope she didn't hear the excitement in my voice that wouldn't be proper

"I was thinking of putting my hair up with chop sticks, but I don't have any chop sticks." Misty says as you comb her hair. "Here we can use these, " you answer as you pick up some yellow pencils from a jar on her desk. She hands you a clip on flower, it's like she know what your are thinking you are in heaven right now. leaning back you admire your handy work, fast and gorgeous. "It's beautiful, I love it!" She chirps with excitement. "Can you help me with my makeup. I always put it on to thick. Can you show me how to apply it properly." You swallow, you can feel a tear this is like a dream come true. "Yes, Yes. I would love to help you."

As you finish her makeup, you tell her. "The secret is to use as little as possible. You must look confident and in charge. Men like that." Then you wink, " But at the same time you have to add a touch of desperation so they think they have a chance with you and you are approachable."
You both laugh and the clock plays music at the top of the hour.
"Time to go Misty we are very late." You quickly wrap your hair up and use pencils to hold it in place like Misty's hair. You both laugh and run out to your car.
As you drive back towards the library. Misty is still reading her notebook. She looks over at you and shyly asks, "Could you help me with my hair and makeup if I came over to your place before work?" She looks down at the note book. "My father disappears for long periods of time with his projects and its just me..."
"Yes, Misty, I would like that." you answer.

Abigail taps you on the shoulder to relieve you and sighs," What is wrong with young girls these days."

After seeing this rude redhead that strange sensation starts to flow through you again. It's strange, there is a real fear somewhere deep down inside of you. Like something is horribly wrong. You aren't feeling right at all yet. Maybe some fresh air would help you. As you walk out the back door you see Misty's boyfriends car off in the far corner of the lot. "I thought they left a long time ago." You start to walk towards it hoping to talk to Misty. Half way across the lot you stop as you see the car going up and down.

Quickly you walk back into the library a little mad You shake your head as much as you like Misty you probably won't be able to save her job. 1151.content:
You see your daughter Katy in the mirror, you reach up and touch your face. It is you! The machine actually worked.
"It worked! It worked!" Your old body screeches to Katy's friend Julie. They both start jumping up and down screaming.

"What's going on here," you try to say in your best mom voice. "OUCH!!!, these damn braces cut my cheek!" You can taste the blood in your mouth as you run your tongue across the cut.

Katy in your old body looks at Julie and they both start laughing. "Yeah they'll do that, those braces suck."

You realize you've lost control of the situation, you feel so helpless and awkward.

Katy in your old body looks at you and says, "Look Mom, I am not popular, I am a social pariah! We are going to throw the ultimate party here tonight. I need this to be popular and I know you would never say yes. So I am now you and it’s going to happen. You are going to help me! You will pretend to be me! You will do nothing to embarrass me! You will hang out and flirt with the boys that I tell you to flirt with! You will not talk to the boys I tell you not to talk to, because God knows you will want to talk to them because you are such a nerd sometimes Mom. Do you understand me?"

"Wow, you sound just like your Mom, Katy....Even have that authority thing that she has." Julie says to your old body.

"I know, I never felt so in control as I do now, I can't believe this. Lets go to the mall and get some supplies, this party will be fantastic,” Your old body says as she pulls out a credit card and a driver’s license. "Also with this I can drive and also get some other supplies."

Julie and your old body go off laughing.

You are totally dumbfounded, why couldn't you stand up to them? What are you going to do? This can't be happening.
'They are so grounded, when I get my body back' you think to yourself

You feel so angry, you walk over to the body switching machine as you keep adding up the years that Katy will be grounded. The machine is dark.

‘They must have shut it off while you were over at the mirror.’ You think to yourself as you find the power switch. You flip the switch; the machine starts lighting back up. You walk over to the computer screen and it has a cursor flashing. You hear the hard drive grinding away. You shut off the machine and restart it and the same thing happens
"CRAP! ...This can't be happening!"

You can't call your husband he's away at work for the weekend and can't get back, besides he won't believe you. He'll think you are pulling his leg since you both watched Freaky Friday last weekend.

You pace back and forth and decide you have 3 choices:

-You can go with it for now and do your best to keep the situation under control. Hope that Julie and Katy did something to the machine so it won’t start up

-The second choice is, you call up Katy and Julie and tell them that the machine is broken and hope they can help you fix it. If they aren’t the ones who sabotaged the machine to keep you from switch back in the first place.

-or the only other choice you can think of right now is to look through the notebook and see if there is a way to get it working again and switch with some sort of authority figure like Zack's Mom Misty or Tara's teacher Rebecca.

NO! This crazy animal is going to try and take over my life. You can't let this happen.

122.content:
About a hundred different questions ran through your head as you stood there staring at the strange machine, growing all the more excited with each passing second. Being able to switch bodies with someone and live out their live, well it was...it was...it was like some crazy plot line from a comic book, not something that you ever imagined could actually be real!

Finally managing to tear your eyes away from the machines impressive workings, aware that this discovery was just way too big to keep to yourself, you then quickly turned and sprinted back out of the machine shop to find anyone you could to show it to - little caring who it actually was.

Unfortunately you found your immediate surroundings to be pretty much deserted (apart from all the chickens that were milling around your feet), due to it being just after breakfast and everyone having gone off in various different directions. Your dad was out in the far fields somewhere working on a tractor that had broken down the day before. Your little sister, Tara had gone off 'exploring' again with the dog and was probably God knows where. And your twin sister Katy, as far as you were aware, had headed over to her friend Julie's house to do...whatever it was teenage girls did with themselves. That just left your mom, who had the last time you'd seen her been cleaning up all of the breakfast dishes as everyone piled out the door. "Mom it is then I guess," you said with a shrug, realizing that she probably wasn't the most ideal person (and probably wouldn't believe you either), but just needing someone to tell, no matter who it was.

Spotting her through the kitchen window, busily washing dishes as you rushed towards the house, you immediately began shouting before you'd even stepped foot in the door, giving her quite a fright as you did. "Mom! Mom! You're not gonna believe what I just found in the old machine shop! It's totally awesome!"

Getting over her initial surprise, your mother looked at with a rather similar expression of disinterest that she greeted most news about the farm with (not being quite as enamored by the place as the rest of you were). "Don't tell me..." she sighed, returning once again to the dishes, "Is it another old piece of junk that your father is going to spend days fixing instead of doing something useful?"

"Nope. Guess again," you told her, shaking your head, "It's an actual real life, fully functioning body switching machine!"

"A body switching machine?"

"Yeah, you know, like in the movies and stuff. A machine for actually changing bodies!"

Your mom wasn't buying this for a second, scoffing, "Seriously Daryl, you expect me to believe that? I'm your mother remember. I'm not as gullible as your little sister."

"I know you're not, and I'm not making it up. Seriously, come look and see! There's the secret door in the back of the machine shop, it leads right to it!"

"A secret door?" she replied, raising an eyebrow, presuming that you must have somehow been confused. "Are you sure it's not just a store room and this 'body switching...thingy' isn't just some old piece of farm equipment?"

"No, no way! It's way too advanced looking to be farm equipment," you assured her, the machine being leaps and bounds ahead of anything else in the machine shop, "Besides, there's a manual and everything that explains what it does! C'mon, please! Please come and look!"

Letting out a another sigh, your mother finally gave in, telling you, "Oh alright. If it'll make you happy. But you have to finish up the dishes in exchange Mr."

"Sure. Whatever," you agreed, grabbing her the by the hand, "Just come look!"

And with that you quickly led your mother out of the back door and across the yard, towards the machine shop, a place that up until now she hadn't actually stepped foot in. "So this is what your father does with all of his spare time?" she muttered disparagingly as she gazed at all the various pieces of dusty old, half rusted machinery lying about the place, presumably looking for the thing that had gotten you so excited. Ignoring this and instead continuing on towards the hidden door you'd discovered not fifteen minutes prior, you went inside, stopped in front of the two large pods and awaited her reaction.

"What on earth is that?" she asked, stopping in her tracks and staring at the machine with a look of both surprise and confusion, having presumably not expected to find anything quite like this - it being way more advanced than anything else on the farm, what with the many flickering diodes, LCD screens and God knows what else on it.

"I already told you, it's a body swapping machine!" you grinned, unable to repress your own eager excitement as you quickly ran over towards it and grabbed the manual up off the floor, presenting it to her. "See!"

Taking the manual from you and opening it up, you watched as your mother's skeptic curiosity soon gave way to complete and utter shock as she soon realized with her own eyes that it was indeed exactly what you'd been trying to tell her it was. "Oh my God," she gasped, almost dropping the booklet to the floor as she looked back up at the machine, then over at you, then at the machine again, her jaw hanging open, "This...this is incredible!"

Happy that she was in agreement with you and feeling even more excited now that you had someone to share in this amazing discovery, the two of you quickly fired questions and theory's at one another about where it came from and what it was built for, and even if it did indeed work. Surprisingly though, it was your mother, not you, who posed most of these questions before you'd even had the chance, appearing positively enamored with the thing and at the prospect of actually becoming someone else.

"Can you imagine it? Swapping bodies? Becoming someone else? It would be an absolutely incredible experience. Like nothing anyone had ever done before."

"Yeah, it would be totally cool," you grinned, having been thinking about all this since you first discovered it, asking then, "You think we should test it?"

Not even missing a beat, your mom rather enthusiastically replied, "Of course! Don't you want to see it in action, sweetheart? Don't you want to swap bodies?"

"Well, yeah. But I mean, do we know if it's safe and stuff? And I mean, do we really have anyone to swap bodies with? Dad's not here. Neither is Zack or..."

"Daryl, sweetheart. We don't need your father or anyone to try it out. We're both here. Me and you can test it out and see if it works."

"Me and you?" you replied somewhat taken aback, having not been prepared for this suggestion. "You mean us swap bodies?"

"Yes," she nodded. "We can test it out right now and find out for sure."

"But won't that be...I dunno, kind of weird? Me becoming you and you becoming me? You are a girl after all...and my mom."

This fact didn't seem to bother her however, as she glanced over at you and giggled, "And? Don't you want to experience what it's like to be in the body of a woman...to be someone completely different from yourself?"

You supposed this was true, and in all honesty it would be kind of cool to see what it's like to be a girl. Still there was a bit of a difference between being a girl and being your own mother, and you couldn't help but feel a little embarrassed at the thought of having...well her parts, so weren't entirely sure what to say.

"And besides, we're just testing the thing," she continued, clearly not feeling the same, "So what does it really matter?"

Giving in then, figuring she had a point and that you wouldn't be her for long, you told her, "I uh, I guess," reminding yourself again that this was a body switching machine sitting there in front of you and anyone else would give their right arm to try it out.

Happy with this answer, your mother then eagerly smiled, "Excellent. Then hop in!"

Doing as instructed as your mom had a final little read over the instruction manual to make sure you followed everything to the letter, you climbed into the left pod and got yourself comfy (or as comfy as you could). Your mother then set all the various buttons and switches to the correct positions on the control panel and climbed into the other pod, before looking over at you and asking, "Okay, sweetheart, you ready?"

"Ready as I'll ever be," you replied, feeling a nervous anticipation taking over your body at the prospect of actually working and becoming her.

"Here goes nothing then," she said, looking just as nervous and as excited as you were, as she reached over and pressed the big red button beside her.

A matter of seconds later, the machine began to hum, the sound growing impressively louder and louder until it abruptly stopped and a huge flash of blinding white light suddenly shot out from the pods completely obscuring your vision for a second before quickly vanishing, leaving you breathing heavily your pod, unsure of what exactly had just happened...

I’m not walking around in my own 10 year old daughter’s body!” Dad didn’t realize it, but he stomped Tara’s foot like she always did when she was mad.

Everybody else laughed seeing Dad act so much like Tara. Now the shortest and youngest member of their family, Dad looked up confused, “Why are you all laughing? Get back in the pod now young lady! We need to switch back!” Everybody continued to laugh and Dad let out another shriek, “OMG! Come on! What is so funny?”

From Daryl’s teenage boy’s body, Mom patted Dad on the head and tried to hold back her laughter, “Relax sweetie. It’s just hilarious for us to watch you act just like Tara. You have her exact facial expressions when she’s mad and the same mannerisms. You even stomped your foot like her.”

Dad finally let out a smirk “I did? Wow? I guess that makes sense since I’m in her body.” Dad decided to relax and have some fun. He recalled a recent outburst that Tara had last week about not being able to wear makeup yet. Dad imitated her, “Ugh! You are so unfair Mom and Dad! I can’t believe you still treat me like a little girl. I’m 10 years old you know!!??” Dad stomped Tara’s foot again and pretended to walk away mad. Dad turned back just like Tara did during her outburst and shrieked, “Ugh! I hate you!”

Everybody laughed hysterically after watching Dad do a perfect imitation of Tara.

“Okay! My turn!” Daryl said joining in on the fun. Since he had Mom’s body, he did an imitation of her. Daryl quickly ran into the kitchen and put Mom’s apron on, “What happened in here!!?? I can’t believe you kids! I cleaned the house all day and you are home for 10 minutes and completely mess it up! Clean it up now or you are both grounded for a week! And no phones at the dinner table or I’m taking them away! Kyle honey, can you please turn down the TV?”

Tara jumped in on the imitations. She quickly sat down in Dad’s favorite chair and sat like Dad always did with his hand slightly down the front of his pants, “I can’t turn it down now! The game is in overtime!” Everybody laughed and Tara then ran into Dad’s closet. Moments later, she came back wearing his jogging shorts and t-shirt. She went back to everybody else and did a few stretches with Dad’s body. She sarcastically imitated Dad again by looking at his watch, “It’s 5 am! I’m going for my daily run! Gotta get 5 miles in every day! Want to join me Daryl?”

Mom quickly ran into Daryl’s bedroom and jumped under the sheets. Mom did an impression of Daryl, “Ugh! Leave me alone Dad! You know I always sleep in until 10. I’m a lazy teenage boy! Can I borrow 10 dollars?”

Everybody continued to laugh after they each did an impression of the body they were in. After a few moments, Dad looked up at his former body with an uneasy feeling, “Uh oh Tara. I think your body needs to pee. It must have been all this laughter. We should get back into the pod and switch bodies.”

Mom interjected, “So soon? We just started having fun! I have a bunch of funny impressions I still want to do with Daryl’s body!”

Daryl agreed, “I agree! I have a few more Mom impressions I want to do!”

Tara looked down at her normal body and nodded, “They are right! I still have some good Dad impressions that I just thought of! Here’s one now!” Tara stood up in and pointed Dad’s finger like he always did when he was making a point, “… I’m the one who earns the money around here to put food on the table. As long as you live in my house, I make the rules!” Everybody snickered as Tara continued, “Is that clear young lady?”

Dad laughed at Tara’s impression of him and replied, “Yes Daddy.” They both laughed again causing Dad have to pee even more. Dad knew everybody else wanted to stay in their current bodies so he finally agreed, “Okay, I’ll think of some more impressions while I’m using the little girl’s room!” Out of habit, dad headed towards the master bathroom. Daryl cut him off. Daryl also felt Mom’s body needed to pee after laughing so hard. Daryl pointed down the hallway to the kid’s bathroom, “Sorry sweetie, but the little girls room is down there! You better hope your brother didn’t pee on the seat!” Daryl winked as he went into the master bathroom.

Dad groaned as he headed towards the kids bathroom. It was much smaller than their fancy master bathroom. But he knew the rules about the kids never using their bathroom. Since he was currently one of the kids, he would have to use theirs.
12212111.title: We stay this way

122121111.content:
Dad had just finished using the bathroom in Tara’s body. He began to hear more voices and laughter. The oldest daughter, Katy, had just gotten home. While Dad was figuring out how to pee as a girl, the rest of the family had obviously filled in Katy about the secret body switching machine. Katy looked wide eyed at her little sister’s body and smirked, “Dad? OMG? I can’t believe that’s really you! That’s so exciting that the machine actually works.”

Dad gave a smile and did a curtsy with Tara's ladybug dress, “Yep! It works just fine! We’ve been doing funny impressions of each other. Want to give it a try?”

Katy nodded and said, “Sure! I have a great idea for a Mom impression!” Katy looked at her mother’s body and said, “Come on Mom! Let’s get into the pods!”

Mom’s body giggled, “That feels so weird to be called Mom.”

Katy nodded, “Oh yea. I forgot all of you have already been using the machine. Who are you again?’

“I’m Daryl. Mom and I were the first ones to switch.”

Katy replied, “Okay Daryl. My turn to impersonate Mom! Let’s get in the pods!”

Daryl grabbed Mom’s breasts and jiggled them up and down, “Awww. Already? I was just getting used to these!”

Katy pushed Daryl into the pod and activated the machine. Moments later, they swapped bodies. Daryl was the first to step out and still had his hands up from fondling Mom’s breasts. But now he had two handfuls of Katy’s boobs. Daryl joked, “Hmmm. Not bad Katy. Mom’s are much bigger but yours are much more perkier!”

Katy stepped out of the pod and took a moment to look at her new body, “Wow! This is crazy. I still can’t believe this works!” Looking over at Daryl who was still feeling her normal body’s boobs, Katy said, “Ahem! Hands off the merchandise please!”

Daryl stuck his tongue out, “Whatever. It’s technically MY body for now!” Daryl put his hands down and then concentrated on Katy’s lower body. Katy was wearing a tight pair of jeans. Daryl felt Katy’s butt and was confused, “Uh? What am I wearing? Everything feels so tight? It feels like there are things poking into my body from everywhere!”

Katy nodded, “You are wearing my thong you idiot. Us girls wear them to make sure our panty line doesn’t show.”

“Oh, cool!” Daryl ran to a mirror to check out Katy’s butt in the mirror. However, after uncomfortably touching Katy’s crotch through the jeans, Daryl asked, “Are you sure this thong is on right? I had Mom’s pussy for awhile and it didn’t feel like this? It’s like there is something else poking completely inside?”

After hearing Daryl say the word pussy, Katy rolled her eyes, “Can you please refrain from using that disgusting word while you are in my body? It’s very unladylike!”

Daryl replied, “Whatever. Mom’s VAGINA didn’t feel like this! Daryl pulled Katy’s skinny jeans slightly away from her crotch and looked down her panties. Daryl finally noticed a string was dangling out of Katy’s vagina. Daryl looked up shocked, “No way! Is that what I think it is?”

Katy winked, “Yep! It’s a tampon! I just started my period today! Enjoy those cramps while you’re in my body!” Daryl quickly replied, “Gross! Let’s get back in the pods! I want Mom’s body back!”

Katy laughed, “So soon? I thought you liked my perkier boobs? Just like you mentioned a second ago, its technically YOUR body now right? So deal with it!”

Daryl groaned as they walked back out to meet the others. Katy immediately went into her Mom impersonation. She strolled around the living room acting like Mom always did and said a few jokes making fun of her.

For the next 10 minutes, everybody continued to take turns doing funny impersonations of the bodies they were in. At times the jokes got mean, but everybody still had fun enjoying how unique the situation was.
122121111.title: More impressions

1221211112.content:
It was lunch time, and since Katy was in Mom’s body, she decided to take her role. She made everybody a sandwich and placed them at the table. It took everybody a moment to find their current body’s appropriate seat at the dinner table. Now in Tara’s spot at the table, Dad couldn’t resist another impersonation as he pouted like Tara always did, “Ugh! I’m totally not eating this! I wanted macaroni.”

From Dad’s body, Tara interrupted and said what Dad always says, “That’s what we are having for lunch princess! Eat it or it goes in the trash!” Tara grabbed Dad’s sandwich and pretended to throw it in the trash. Dad jokingly replied, “Okay okay! I’ll eat it.” With a cute smile, Dad added, “Can you atleast cut the crust off for me Daddy?”

Everybody burst out in laughter seeing how perfect the impersonation was. Tara was always particular about what she ate and was always complaining at the dinner table.

Katy noticed that Daryl got up to make another sandwich and quickly corrected him, “Not so fast! Only one sandwich with my body okay? It’s swimsuit season and I don’t want you to gain me any weight!”

Daryl thought about her comment and suddenly wondered what it would be like to wear one of Katy’s swimsuits. Daryl suggested, “Hmm. That’s a good idea. Anybody up for a swim after lunch?”

From Daryl’s body, Mom also smiled, “That sounds like a fun idea! I’d like to see what walking around shirtless feels like!”

From Dad’s body, Tara agreed, “Me too!” Tara then reached into a bag that was lying on the counter from a shopping trip last weekend. She pulled out a brand new yellow one-piece swimsuit and held it up to her former body, “This is perfect opportunity! I was hoping to be the first one to wear my new bathing suit. But given the opportunity, it will be great to see how it actually looks on me!”

Dad took the small one-piece and gulped. The idea of wearing a woman’s swimsuit was intriguing to Dad. However, he would much rather try it as a woman with more assets like Katy or his wife, Liz. Dad felt tiny in Tara’s 10 year old body and wondered if anybody would want to use the secret body switching machine again and switch places.

From Mom’s body, Katy did her best to sound motherly, “Settle down everybody! You know the rules. No swimming for 30 minutes after eating!”

Everybody laughed and decided what to do next.

12212111122.title: Dad talks somebody into switching places

choices: The effect is delayed; you'll suddenly switch bodies later.
The effect is gradual; Mom's personality and memories slowly replace yours.
1222.content:
Just as you're about to move, you suddenly feel a sharp pain in your head, which fades with merciful quickness to leave a dull throbbing behind. Still dazed after the bright flash, you lean forward against the pod's door until it abruptly shoots open and you stumble out.

You rub your eyes and quickly confirm that you are, in fact, still yourself. You're slightly relieved, but mostly disappointed. All that excitement and it didn't work.

Mom exits the other pod, clutching her head. You hope the machine didn't do anything beyond inducing headaches. But you still feel a bit like you're in some crazy story, and it wouldn't be much of a story if the machine did nothing...
1222.title: Nothing happened? Yeah, right.

choices: He agrees and you go fetch your father
He disagrees, wanting to stay your mother a while
12221.content:
Looking over at your mom to make sure she was alright (and perhaps find out where exactly the two of you had gone wrong), you got one hell of a surprise as she suddenly shrieked in excitement, "Oh wow...IT WORKED!"

This naturally left you somewhat confused - seeing how it quite obviously hadn't worked - and watching as she then proceeded to gawp at herself, pulling and prodding at her long red hair (as if it was the first time she'd ever touched it), you could only surmise that she was just messing around. "This...this is so weird!" she continued, eventually looking back at you, her face now wearing an expression of wide eyed enthusiasm you never before seen her wear, "I'm a girl! I'm...I'm you!"

"Very funny, mom," you told her, shaking your head, having had quite enough of her performance.

She wasn't quite ready to give up the act just yet however, shooting you a look of confusion at this. "Wuh...wait, what? But..but you're mom!"

"Yeah, yeah. I get it. Your making fun of me cause I believed it would actually swap our bodies. But you thought it would work too remember?"

"What are you talking about? It did work! It swapped our bodies! I'm you now and you're me....It's freaking incredible!"

Though you'd never seen her act quite like this before and she was admittedly doing quite a good job of pretending to be you, you weren't really in the mood for this right now, telling her, "Okay. Whatever..." before grabbing the instruction manual and heading over to the control panel of the machine to try and figure out where you'd gone wrong.

Your mother however wasn't ready to stop just yet, still giving it all she had with this rather pointless performance. "'Whatever'? Are you serious? We just swapped bodies and you're like 'whatever'?! This is way better than 'whatever'! This is the greatest discovery in the history of the world! I mean I'm...I'm a chick!...Holy crap, I'm actually a chick...." It was at this point that her voice sort of wavered, and looking back up from the booklet you saw her attention once again focused on her own body - her eyes lingering on her large chest for a lot longer than you would have deemed appropriate.

Okay, as funny as this wasn't to begin with, it definitely wasn't funny now. Your mom was acting way too creepy for your liking and making you feel more than a little uncomfortable. As far as you were aware she'd never been that great of an actress, but here she was giving an almost Oscar worthy performance as fourteen year old boy in an adult woman's body - moving and talking in a manner that was far more familiar as...well, as you!

"Okay, seriously, mom, just quit it will you! You're freaking me out."

"Mom? Why do...why do you keep calling me mom?" she replied, sounding rather disturbed. "...What the hell is going on?"

"That's what I wanna know!" you shot back, feeling your own growing sense of unease quickly building (your gut telling you that something was seriously wrong indeed).

"We...we switched bodies...Didn't we?"

"No, we didn't! We're still in our own bodies! I'm Daryl and you're my mom, so will you please stop pretending like you're me!"

"Buh...but...No. No way! You have to be mom," she said, her voice trembling now with desperation. "I'm Daryl! I'm your son and you're my mom!"

It was at this point that the realization of what had happened suddenly hit, seeing the fear and sincerity in your mother's face, and standing there staring at one another for almost a full thirty seconds while this information sunk in, you both then simultaneously squeaked (as if indeed you were the same person) "...oh shit!" The body swapping machine might not have worked as intended, but it had definitely done something...something which was just too freaky for words!

"Oh my God. I think that somehow the machine has switched mom's mind with mine," you said, attempting to understand it as you did (your 'mom' clearly doing the same as well), "So that you think you're me!"

"No way!" she responded, shaking her head defensively, "I'm me. It must have switched your mind!"

"That doesn't make any sense, how can it switch my mind? ...I'm already me!"

"Are you thought? How do I know?"

"Because I am!" you yelped, finding it utterly bizarre that you were having to actually prove your own identity, before of course realizing that your 'mom' was obviously feeling exactly the same way.

"Okay, then prove it! When was the fist time I got into a fight?"

"In the 4th grade, after Billy Mackenzie tripped me up in gym class," you told her, shooting a question back of your own. "Where was my super secret hideout in our old house, the one I used to keep Tara from stealing my toys?"

"Duh...in the attic, behind all those old lawn chairs," she replied with a shrug, as if finding the question way too easy.

Deciding on a much harder question to ask then, you found yourselves once again (rather eerily so) hurriedly blurting out the exact same thing, asking "Where did me and Mary have our first kiss?", and answering almost immediately with "Out in the woods by that gnarly old oak tree!" - proving without a shadow of a doubt that it most definitely was your mind inhabiting your mother's body.

"Oh crap," she gulped (or should you say he?), dragging her eyes back to her now middle aged hands, no longer looking quite so amazed.

"Yep. We're the same person," you said, still trying to wrap your head around it - it appearing for all intensive purposes that it was your mother standing right there in front of you. "Or at least you think you are."

What followed was one of the more bizarrer conversation you'd ever had in your life (as if it wasn't bizarre enough already), as the two of you tried to figure out what the hell had gone wrong and how the machine had managed to screw up so badly, as well as trying to come to terms with the reality of your situation. Your mom, or the 'other you' was clearly having difficulty getting to grips with the fact that he wasn't who he thought he was, and you similarly were more than a little freaked out at having to deal with 'yourself' in the guise of your own mom. It was all just completely surreal.

Unfortunately, after a rather exhaustive search of the manual and after somewhat unsuccessfully trying to retrace what your mom had done to the controls, the two of you ended up drawing a complete blank - having no idea what had gone wrong, nor how to fix it.

"I don't understand how this happened. It says nothing anywhere about copying brains or rewriting minds or whatever the hell this is," you sighed, chucking the manual to the floor and looking up at the 'other you' in frustration. "How are we supposed to fix it?"

"Beats me," he shrugged, giving up his own overly thorough examination of the various dials and switches. "If only we knew what mom did when she turned it on."

"You can't like...you know access her memories or anything like that then?"

"Uhm, no," came his reply, laughing at the thought.

"Crap! That would have been really useful too."

With very little options remaining now - the only sensible, adult brain in the room having been replaced by your dorky one - you figured that there was nothing for it, you had to tell your Dad, hoping that he would somehow be able to reverse this and actually bring your mother back...
12221.title: Mom thinks she's you!

choices: You head back into the house (your POV)
You head back into the house (your mom's POV)
122212.content:
Putting this idea to him then, you saw a sudden look of realization appear on your mother's face as the 'other you', nervously yelped, "No, wait! We can't! What if he fixes it?"

"What do you mean?" you asked, pretty sure that's what you'd been trying to do for the last fifteen minutes or so. "That's what we want him to do. Dad's good with mechanical stuff. If anyone can bring mom back he can!"

"I know, but...but what happens to me? If mom gets her own mind back, do I just like disappear or die or what?"

This wasn't something you'd actually given any thought to, but in a way you supposed that was what in essence would essentially happen. "Uhm, I...I guess so," you replied, getting the impression by his panicked look that that definitely wasn't what he wanted to hear.

Sure enough, the next words out of his mouth where, "Then maybe this isn't such a good idea. I'm not sure I want to die. Not yet anyway."

Faced with a similar prospect, you weren't entirely sure you'd want to either, but still 'he' wasn't really anyone, he was just your mom who thought she was you, and you really did need to get your mom back. Treading as tactfully as you could then, you tried to assuage some of these worries by explaining, "But you won't really. You'll just be who you're supposed to be - which is mom." pointing then to your own forehead as you added, "You'll still be in here."

"You'll still be in there," he said, mimicking your action by pointing at his own head, "But the you that's in here...that is mom, he'll be gone forever!"

Clearly there was no sneaking anything past yourself and you unfortunately couldn't really argue. "Well technically, yes. But what are we supposed to do? You're mom, not me! You're not supposed to be in there. You can't just stay inside her body and pretend like everything's normal. It wouldn't be right!"

Slumping against one of the pods, being of course aware of this himself (it was 'his' mom too his mind had overwritten after all), he replied sadly, "Yeah, I know. It's just...I've, well, I know I'm not really you, but it totally feels like I am. And here I am inside someone else's body...experiencing something that nobody has ever done, and you're wanting to change me back already!" You could see where this was going, but you let him continue on, really feeling for his predicament. "Couldn't I just stay a little while? Not forever, but just long enough to truly experience what it's like, and maybe have some fun with it. Don't tell me it wouldn't be totally awesome to have yourself as your 'mom'? We could totally play video games all day, and I could let you off with all kinds of shit, and we could do whatever the hell we want because I'm an adult now!"

Admittedly that was kind of a fun thought - being your own parent (though a slightly surreal one at the same time) - and you didn't doubt having yourself for company wouldn't be a blast. Heck, who'd be more fun to be around than someone who likes and hates all the same stuff as you do, knows everything you know, and who you wouldn't have to worry about upsetting or annoying, cause he's exactly the same as you?

"Please," he begged, snapping you from your thoughts, your mother's pleading face being a sight you don't ever think you'd seen before. "Come on, dude, you know it'll be awesome."

While probably not the wisest decision you'd ever made, your curiosity did eventually win out, figuring that there'd be no real harm in letting him stay for a little while. And so you told him, "Okay. I guess." watching as his face instantly lit up. "But on one condition..."

"Sure, anything! Name it!"

"If we're not going to tell dad, then we've got to figure out how to fix this thing ourselves. Agreed?"

"You got it!" he beamed, looking like he would have agreed to just about anything as he enthusiastically jumped up off the pod and began doing a stupid little dance. A stupid little dance that you often did when things went your way, and which seeing now, performed by your mother's body, looked absolutely ridiculous.

Once he'd gotten this out of his system and you made a mental note to stop dancing like that in the future, you asked yourself, "So...what now?" having no real idea what to do now, this whole thing being a very unreal and confusing situation. Not that you couldn't see the funny side though, adding jokingly as an afterthought "...mom."
122212.title: He disagrees, wanting to stay your mother a while

12223.content:
"Unh... Daryl?" your mom utters groggily. She blinks rapidly before looking at you. "It didn't work?"

"Apparently not," you sigh.

A few seconds of awkward silence pass.

"I guess we were being a bit silly," Mom says glumly.

"I guess," you say, looking at the machine's detailed instructions again. "But it seems like it could have worked, you know? I mean, it did feel like it was doing something. And these notes... they're not just a crazy person's rambling. Whoever built this must have been onto something. I feel like we could make it work, if we just knew how."

Mom looks hopeful, but not terribly convinced. "Well... we'll have another look at it later. Maybe your dad will have some idea of what to do with it."

With that, she leaves the room. Well, now what are you going to do for the rest of the day? You suppose you had better get the laundry done...

Wait, where did that thought come from? You shake your head. Were you really so convinced you were going to swap bodies with your mom that you can't help thinking about what you'd do as her?

With a sigh, you turn back the machine. Just looking at that futuristic marvel eases your feelings of embarrassment and disappointment. There has to be something to it... but you don't want to mess with it yourself, for fear of breaking it. You'd better find something else to do for now.

You start washing the dishes after about twenty minutes you finish and focus back in on reality. "Huh? I've never washed the dishes before that's strange..." you say and you hear the dryer go off. "Looks like the laundries done I better get that done." you say as you head to the basement and put the laundry into the laundry basket and bring it to living room seeing it's time to watch your favorite SOAP. What will happen from here?

1223.title: Something very unexpected happened

12233.content:
As the air grew silent for the second time, you kept your eyes closed and just waited as all the sensations passed. With your eyes still closed tight, you slowly brought your hands to your face. You could feel your old facial features. But something felt, off. Your skin felt softer and smoother. Wondering what the heck had happened, you slowly opened your eyes. As you do you try and look down at your hands, only to have something block your view. As you brush it away you notice that it's long red hair like what your mother has. Upon further inspection you discovered that you were wearing her blue sundress, heeled sandals, underwear, and even her red nail polish on your fingers and toes. Now that you thought about it, you could even feel her makeup. Slowly, you pushed open the pod door and stepped out. Looking around you noticed your mother doing the exact same thing in your clothes, all magically resized to fit her perfectly. That's when it hit you that her clothes fit you perfectly as well.

"Wha, what's going on" mom asked.

"I, I don't know" you replied. "I thought that this was a body swap machine, not a clothes swapping machine"

"Well, we should probably try and change back. I don't know about you but I feel really weird right now"

"I totally agree with" you started, before getting distracted by a small explosion coming from the machine.

"NO!" Mom shouted. "No no no no no no, this can't be happening. Not now. Not while we're stuck like this"

"Well let's see if we can find dad and see if he can fix this, and us" you said.

"I guess we don't have any other choice right now" mom replied with an extremely long face.

You followed your mom out of the shed, stumbling a bit from time to time due to the heeled sandles she had put on this morning. After the short walk back to the house, you immediately went to your room to change out of your moms sundress. However, the moment you got in there and looked through what had been your clothes you realized that somehow more had changed than just what the two of you were wearing at the moment. Pulling a pair of jeans out of your closet you discovered that they also looked as though they would no longer fit you but rather your mother.

"Moooom" you called out.

"What is it Daryl" she said as she walked into your room.

"It looks like whatever happened to what we were wearing also happened to all of our clothes. These won't even fit me anymore"

"Yeah, and did you notice the family photo in the hall. It seems like somehow the machine changed our lives or something like that"

"That's ridicules" you say.

"It makes more sense than any else right now"

"I guess your right"

"Yeah, so how about this. We play along with whatever happens until we can get your father to fix that machine. In the meantime, MOM, you've got dishes that still need washing"
12233.title: Something else went wrong!

choices: Go get Zack see if he can help
123.content:
You decide to go back to the house and get Zack. You step out of the shed and run into Katy.
She asks, "What are you doing there Darryl. Never noticed this door before."

She pokes her head in the door and starts looking around. "Wow Darryl, this is so cool." she picks up the notebook and starts reading it. She looks at you and then at Julie who is standing in the door way.

Julie looks around and says, “this is so cool." Julie walks over and starts reading the notebook with Katy.

This is not what you wanted. Now everybody knows about this. Well this is just great. I was going to get Zack and test it out.

Julie looks at you and says, "Why don't you and Katy switch." It would be perfect. You think what could it hurt.

You and Katy both climb into a pod. Julie hits the red button on the central control panel. There is a brilliant light and you step out of the machine. You are so much more petite. You feel a little dizzy. You look in the mirror. You are Katy. Katy pushes you out of the way.

She stands in front of the mirror and flexes. Then both her and Julie start laughing. You start getting mad because she is imitating little gestures that you do and then they both start laughing.

"Knock it off you guys!" you yell.

Julie and Katy in unison say "Knock it off you guys!"

You go over to put your sister who is now you in a headlock. She picks you up and gets you into a bear hug and you can't break free. You can't believe how helpless you feel.

"Let me go." you gasp.

"This feels so good. You don't know how long I've been waiting to do that." Your old body snickers at you. She tosses you down.

"I've never done anything like that to you." you say almost ready to cry.

"Ah, here it is. She approached the machine and rotated a few dials. "This should give Betsy a high enough intelligence to pass for you. She'll even be unaware of the change. It says we can wipe enough of her memory so she'll never realize anything was wrong. Don't worry.", she said as your eyes got bigger. "You'll keep your intelligence. Wouldn't be worth doing the switch if you couldn't understand Katy. Finally, Katy came into the room, pulling a very reluctant, and irritated cow into the hidden room.

You looked a Betsy and began getting excited. You really want to spend a whole 2 weeks as a cow.

"Uh, okay, let's get this over with.", you said, trying to hide your concern.

You enter the pod as the girls adjust the device and attach it to Betsy's head.

"Hurry up!", said Katy. "She's not going to tolerate this much longer!"

Before you could change your mind, you pushed the red button. You felt strange and disoriented as if you were being sucked out of your own body. Seconds later, you were looking at yourself in the pod. You tried to yell, but all that came out was a very loud "Mooooooooooooo!". Looking down, you could see your front legs and almost staggered.

"Whoa! Easy girl, I mean Tara,"said Katy. "Just calm down a minute until you adjust."

Your vision was a little different than you were used to given the placement of your new eyes. After a few minutes, you felt comfortable enough to take a step. As you moved forward, you became very aware of your new, very full, udder swaying. A few more steps, and walking came much more easily.

"Can you understand us?", said Julie as she rubbed your head. "Moo 3 times for yes."

"Moo... moo... MOOOOO...", came out of your very thick and clumsy lips.

"Excellent!", exclaimed Katy. "Let's get you back before Mom or Dad notice. It's also time for your milking.", she said with a wink. "Why don't you two make sure Betsy, I mean Tara is okay. Get her out of here and close the door behind you. With any luck, she'll forget that this room is here.

Katy led you toward the pen as Julie helped up your previous, and very confused body. "How do you feel", she asked you as you walked. So many new sensations hit you as you walked along in your new and massive body. "Oh, you can't quite answer me.", she realized and smirked. "We'll have to work out a code. One moo for "No" and two moos for "Yes". That's how I'll be able to communicate with you. I bet this is exciting! I've always wondered what it would be like to be an animal. Maybe I'll try it out once you switch back."

You had to admit, it was kind of exciting. No school or obligations. It could be a nice vacation. Everyone else would just see you as a simple milk cow. Eat, sleep and enjoy the outdoors.

As you reached the gate, Katy released you from the strap and led you into the pasture. Go ahead and eat and get to know the other cows.", she said pushing you forward. "It's time for dinner and Dad will be back any minute now. He'll need some help unloading the new livestock and we'll have to make sure Betsy has a clear enough head to help him unload. From now on, you're Betsy. Go on Betsy! We'll start rehearsing tomorrow girl. I owe you one!", she said as she ran back toward the house.

125111211.content:
Daryl entered the gate and began walking over to the other two cows as he heard the gate latch behind him.

He tried his best to say hello to the two older cows, but wasn't surprised when they didn't respond. He knew the mostly black furred cow was named Daisy and the other brown cow was Maggie. It was very strange looking at the cows eye to eye now that he was as big as them.

Daryl wandered over to a grassy patch and began to graze. His movements seemed much more natural now. He didn't have a whole lot of experience with the cows, but he didn't think it would be that difficult to pass himself of as Betsy. After all, cows really didn't do a whole lot. He wondered how Betsy was handling herself in Tara's body. A lot has happened and he doesn't even know where his old body is. He was worried what could Tara be doing in his body.

As Daryl began chewing his cud, he looked up and saw his Mom walking towards the barn. "It must be time for milking.", he thought as he made his way to the milking area so he would be first. His Mom came out with a harness and looked at Daryl suspiciously.

"I don't want any trouble this time Betsy. For once try to make this easy on me.", said Liz as she attached the harness.

As she pulled Daryl toward the station, she gave "Betsy" an odd look. "Katy's made a lot of progress with you. That's a GOOD GIRL!", she said as she patted Daryl on his muzzle. "You're so much more cooperative than normal. If you're this calm through your milking, I might have to give you a special treat. In fact, I do have a surprise for you later. I think you'll enjoy it quite a bit.", said Liz with a wink.

Daryl was wondering what kind of surprise she had in mind when all of a sudden his Mom began massaging his udder to get the milk.

A low moo escaped his big mouth as he felt a very pleasant feeling wash over him. "Oh my God! This... feels... amazing!", thought Daryl as he closed his eyes and relaxed. He thought that Tara would totally enjoy this, but right know he was enjoying it.

After a very pleasant 10 or 15 minutes, Liz stood up from her stool and gathered the buckets full of warm milk. After storing the milk, she led a somewhat disappointed Daryl back to the pasture, praising him all the way back. "Maybe I overreacted when I said you'd make a tasty steak.", she said with a smirk.

Daryl's eyes got big as he processed his Mom's last comment, but he quickly realized that his Mom was joking. After all, the fair was coming and Katy needed her prize cow. However, the comment did unsettle him quite a bit.

After getting settled in the pasture, Daryl's mind wandered as he began grazing again. It wasn't long before he heard his Dad's truck driving up toward the house with a very large trailer in tow. After the car stopped, he saw his old body come out to help unload the trailer. Hm it seems Tara was doing fine in his body. He wondered what his Dad brought.

About 3 seconds later, it was done. The bull dismounted and walked away leaving you a bit disappointed.

After you mooed three times, relief washed across Katy's face. "Thought we lost you there for a minute. Well you're a good sport for sticking with it! I know Buster has been quite...occupied." If you had been human, your face would have been flush with embarrassment right now. "Moo.... mooo." Despite the humiliation, you still answer truthfully. "That's good, girl. Very good. I've enjoyed myself a lot, too." She presses herself close to the guy beside her. Daryl. Your former body.

"Hi there, Betsy," he says. "I'm glad to see my big brother is enjoying life as a cow. Your life is great, by the way. Being a strong, confident guy. And sex! Of course, you know, you've had much more of it even than us. I wonder, is cow sex as good as human sex? Maybe better, even? You can just stand around anywhere, getting boned, and noone will care."

"So, anyway, Betsy," Julie interrupts. "I told Daryl about you and Tara swapping bodies. And that's when I found out about him and Tara. Or you and Tara. Well, you understand. And why he suddenly turned into such a good bad boy." She gropes him, grinds against him. "You know, Daryl, this is all kind of making me horny," she says to him. You mooo, loudly, at them, starting to fear that this is going in a very bad direction.

Fear once again mounts inside you.

"Katy won't know. She had to run an errand, and I told her I'd do the swap." Julie grins again. "Tara's been having strange dreams about being a cow, I'm sure I can convince her that they're real and that she used to be Betsy, and to get her in on it."

"So, yeah, we thought we'd come down here and see if you're still in there, I suppose. If you weren't it wouldn't be any point in doing a swap anyway. So, moo twice if you want to swap back and become Tara."

There is no doubt in your mind. Of course you want to swap back. As you are about to answer, you notice something behind you. Crap! Buster! In panic, you manage to get in two moos before he mounts you.
