"Katy asked first.", you said as a smile came to Katy's face. You knew a cow wouldn't fit into such a small chair, but you'd come off looking like a hero in front of Julie for offering. "I know how important this is for you.", you said confidently as you smiled at Julie.

Julie looked disappointed but gave you a nice warm hug. "That's so nice of you to help out your big Sis! This contest means a lot to her. I'll have to think of a proper reward for you when you're back to your own body.", said Julie with a quick wink.

You blushed at Julie and looked over toward the machine.

Katy was examining the contraption with a confused look on her face. "How are we ever going to hook up Betsy to this? She'll never fit on this pod. It looks like it's only meant for humans.", she said with a disappointed look on her face.

"I'm sorry Katy. I really wish there was some way I could help you. This upsets me as much as it does you.", you said, trying to hide your relief.

"Wait a sec!", said Katy as she pointed to an attachment on the side of the machine. "Check this out! It must be some kind of adapter. It even has an adjustable strap. We can fit this on Betsy after all! Oh thank you Daryl! We'll certainly bring home a first place ribbon!"

You looked nervously at the attachment as Katy ran out to get Betsy. Tara ran after her, leaving Julie and you alone by the machine.

"You're so sweet Daryl. She said as she gave you a quick kiss on the cheek. We'll have a lot of fun. The fair is next week and I'll make sure I stop by and visit you every day. I wonder if Betsy will be able to pass for you?", she said as she scanned the notebook.

"I'm going to be a cow for 2 weeks!? What have I gotten myself into?", you thought as Julie read through the book.

"Ah, here it is. She approached the machine and rotated a few dials. "This should give Betsy a high enough intelligence to pass for you. She'll even be unaware of the change. It says we can wipe enough of her memory so she'll never realize anything was wrong. Don't worry.", she said as your eyes got bigger. "You'll keep your intelligence. Wouldn't be worth doing the switch if you couldn't understand Katy.

Minutes passed as Julie sat with you on a bench holding your hand. Finally, Katy came into the room, pulling a very reluctant, and irritated cow into the hidden room.

You looked a Betsy and began to panic. You didn't really want to spend a whole 2 weeks as a cow, but you were afraid to back out now and disappoint everyone, especially Julie.

"Uh, okay, let's get this over with.", you said, trying to hide your concern.

You enter the pod as the girls adjust the device and attach it to Betsy's head.

"Hurry up!", said Katy. "She's not going to tolerate this much longer!"

Before you could change your mind, you pushed the red button. You felt strange and disoriented as if you were being sucked out of your own body. Seconds later, you were looking at yourself in the pod. You tried to yell, but all that came out was a very loud "Mooooooooooooo!". Looking down, you could see your front legs and almost staggered.

"Whoa! Easy girl, I mean Daryl.", said Katy. "Just calm down a minute until you adjust."

Your vision was a little different than you were used to given the placement of your new eyes. After a few minutes, you felt comfortable enough to take a step. As you moved forward, you became very aware of your new, very full, udder swaying. A few more steps, and walking came much more easily.

"Can you understand us?", said Julie as she rubbed your head. "Moo 3 times for yes."

"Moo... moo... MOOOOO...", came out of your very thick and clumsy lips.

"Excellent!", exclaimed Katy. "Let's get you back before Mom or Dad notice. It's also time for your milking.", she said with a wink. "Why don't you two make sure Betsy, I mean Daryl is okay. Get him out of here and close the door behind you. With any luck, he'll forget that this room is here.

Katy led you toward the pen as Julie and Tara helped up your previous, and very confused body. "How do you feel", she asked you as you walked. So many new sensations hit you as you walked along in your new and massive body. "Oh, you can't quite answer me.", she realized and smirked. "We'll have to work out a code. One moo for "No" and two moos for "Yes". That's how I'll be able to communicate with you. I bet this is exciting! I've always wondered what it would be like to be an animal. Maybe I'll try it out once you switch back."

You had to admit, it was kind of exciting. No school or obligations. It could be a nice vacation. Everyone else would just see you as a simple milk cow. Eat, sleep and enjoy the outdoors.

As you reached the gate, Katy released you from the strap and led you into the pasture. Go ahead and eat and get to know the other cows.", she said pushing you forward. "It's time for dinner and Dad will be back any minute now. He'll need some help unloading the new livestock and we'll have to make sure Betsy has a clear enough head to help him unload. From now on, you're Betsy. Go on Betsy! We'll start rehearsing tomorrow girl. I owe you one!", she said as she ran back toward the house.
12533111.title: Katy first

125331111.content:
Daryl entered the gate and began walking over to the other two cows as he heard the gate latch behind him.

He tried his best to say hello to the two older cows, but wasn't surprised when they didn't respond. He knew the mostly black furred cow was named Daisy and the other brown cow was Maggie. It was very strange looking at the cows eye to eye now that he was as big as them.

Daryl wandered over to a grassy patch and began to graze. His movements seemed much more natural now. He didn't have a whole lot of experience with the cows, but he didn't think it would be that difficult to pass himself of as Betsy. After all, cows really didn't do a whole lot. He wondered how Betsy was handling herself in his body and hoped that she didn't do anything to embarrass him. Then again, he was a little worried that she would play his role too well. "I can't believe I let them talk me into this!", he thought. "What if I'm stuck like this? Do Mom and Dad know about the machine? Is this what happened to the previous owners? I really should have thought this through."

As Daryl began chewing his cud, he looked up and saw his Mom walking towards the barn. "It must be time for milking.", he thought as he made his way to the milking area so he would be first. His Mom came out with a harness and looked at Daryl suspiciously.

"I don't want any trouble this time Betsy. For once try to make this easy on me.", said Liz as she attached the harness.

As she pulled Daryl toward the station, she gave "Betsy" an odd look. "Katy's made a lot of progress with you. That's a GOOD GIRL!", she said as she patted Daryl on his muzzle. "You're so much more cooperative than normal. If you're this calm through your milking, I might have to give you a special treat. In fact, I do have a surprise for you later. I think you'll enjoy it quite a bit.", said Liz with a wink.

Daryl was wondering what kind of surprise she had in mind when all of a sudden his Mom began massaging his udder to get the milk.

A low moo escaped his big mouth as he felt a very pleasant feeling wash over him. "Oh my God! This... feels... amazing!", thought Daryl as he closed his eyes and relaxed.

After a very pleasant 10 or 15 minutes, Liz stood up from her stool and gathered the buckets full of warm milk. After storing the milk, she led a somewhat disappointed Daryl back to the pasture, praising him all the way back. "Maybe I overreacted when I said you'd make a tasty steak.", she said with a smirk.

Daryl's eyes got big as he processed his Mom's last comment, but he quickly realized that his Mom was joking. After all, the fair was coming and Katy needed her prize cow. However, the comment did unsettle him quite a bit.

After getting settled in the pasture, Daryl's mind wandered as he began grazing again. It wasn't long before he heard his Dad's truck driving up toward the house with a very large trailer in tow. After the car stopped, he saw his old body come out to help unload the trailer. Betsy didn't seem to be struggling with his old body. Katy and Julie were heading toward the trailer as well.

"Julie must have stayed for dinner.", thought Daryl. I wonder what he brought back from the auction?"
125331111.title: Getting to know the other Cows.

1253311111.content: You see your dad and your body open the trailer and grab a piece of rope and they lead 2 horses out and into some stables that must have been built between buy the old owners of the farm but your dad must have fixed them in secret a bought horses to fill it. Once the horses are in the stable Katy and Julie turn around and start walking towards you. “How are you doing” asked Julie you mooed twice for yes “good to hear” she said “soo Daryl we were thinking about about the horses because dad bought these horses to replace the cows for the fair so you don’t need to be Betsy anymore but it’S up to you what to do stay and enjoy the cow life for let’s say a week and hope the butcher doesn’t some more meat or swap with the filly we called Tracy 1 moo for cow 2 for horse
1253311111.title: Horses for the family.

12533111112.content: Good let’s get you out of there and into the pod to swap you with haste the get you in the shed it’s then they realised that your dad would be watching the horses to make sure they settle in so the had to compromise they shouted on Tara to go get her new pet witch is rabbit they put it in the pod and push the button your now in the other pod the rabbit in Betsy is now just a cow and it’s put into the field as Tara picks you up and takes you into here room and feeds you some carrots later Julie comes in a says she is going to swap with another rabbit so she can stay the night and not miss the action and left 10 minutes later a rabbit comes in it’s jullie as it’s getting late Tara puts you and Julie in a hut outside together and jokingly says “welcome to your first house as a couple a bit small for me though” you say to Julie about the living space in here as a rabbit this place is massive bigger than my normal house as a human you a Julie find the warmest place in the hat and fall a sleep waking up is the weirdest thing because you think your in your house in bed your your fur is the bed and a small rabbit hut is your house you were hungry but could tell by the sun that Tara would be a while on getting to feeding the animals on the farm you woke up Julie how had had a lovely sleep but was also hungry about a hour later Tara came to feed you and Julie your breakfast was carrot and apple witch tastes amazing in this body once you had finished your small bowl of food Tara said that Julie’s body was coming over in a hour so she took Julie and you into her room to play it’s then Tara told you and Julie that the horses were only a one day thing and were going away later to there owner but dad was going to get his own ones for taking care of them in a few days so she offered to swap you with Betsy or stay as a rabbit
12533111112.title: Horse

choices: Daryl avoids the bull for tonight. The bull claims one of the other cows.
The bull claims Daryl as his mate.
1253311112.content:
Daryl watched his Dad back the trailer up to the gate so that the animals inside only had one way out, and that was into the pasture with him. Julie came over to the edge of the fence and casually motioned him closer.

He walked up to see Julie and was glad she stuck around. "Looks like you've for some more company!", said Julie with a smile. "You seem to be adjusting well. We heard how much of a good girl you were from your Mom. Did you enjoy your milking?"

"Mooooo moo...", said Daryl without thinking. "I probably should have let that one go. It's a little embarrassing to be admitting that in front of Julie.", he thought. If cows could blush, he'd be bright red.

Julie giggled and stroked his muzzle. "That's what I thought. I can't wait to try it myself! Don't worry. It'll be a secret between us GIRLS.", said Julie with a teasing smile.

Daryl was so taken by Julie's beautiful smile, that he didn't notice the animal coming out of the trailer. It wasn't until he saw the smile suddenly fade from her face that he turned around to see what had caused her sudden change of mood.

There, strutting into the pasture, was a very large black bull.

"Uh, so there... Uh Betsy. I... Uhh... Think I'd better get home. Looks like you might need a little privacy. Uh... See you tomorrow.", said Julie as she shifted uncomfortably. She waved toward a very shocked Katy as she ran towards home.

"Oh, no! I'm so screwed!", thought Daryl as he stared at the massive male. "In more ways than one."
1253311112.title: A bull for the herd.

choices: The temptation to let the bull have his way is too great.
12533111121.content:
Daryl kept his backside up against the fence. He saw Katy walking over to him with a smirk on her face.

"Well now Betsy. Don't let that bull wear you out tonight. We'll be getting up bright and early to practice for the fair. Looks like we'll have some calves running around soon. Want to see what it's like to be a Mother?", teased Katy.

"Moooooooooooo!", said Daryl with wide eyes.

"I'm just kidding there Betsy! You have no sense of humor, do you?", said Katy. "The new Daryl is adjusting well. I think I might like the new Daryl better. He's a lot more fun. I'll see you tomorrow girl!"

Daryl really regretted switching with Betsy. He wished that he could switch back already, but knew that he must stick it out a few more weeks. After all, he couldn't quite ask them to switch him back. He really missed being able to talk and was growing bored. It was starting to get dark and he was now alone with the animals. As he began eating grass again, he noticed the bull had mounted one of the other cows. The cow moo'd very low as the bull rocked her back and forth. She was certainly enjoying herself.

As Daryl watched, he began to wonder what it felt like. The milking he had earlier was amazing, but this... Could he really let that happen? After all, nobody would be even know. He felt a tingle as his mind wandered. Memories of being mounted by a bull flooded his mind. He remembered how great it felt the last time it happened. "Last time!?", thought Daryl. "I must have triggered Betsy's memories and that might not be a good idea. It makes sense that I would have some of Betsy's memories considering that she had mine. I don't want to lose myself to her thoughts."

Memories of giving birth flooded his mind as stood there watching the bull. He let out a very loud and long moo as the bull dismounted and looked over his way.

"What the heck am I doing!?", thought Daryl. "I gotta get a hold of myself.", as he tried to push the thoughts from his mind. "I'm a man, not a stupid beast. I need to be a bit more careful."

Daryl walked away from the bull, trying not to attract anymore attention. The bull didn't pursue and walked over to the other cow.
12533111121.title: Daryl avoids the bull for tonight. The bull cla...

125331111211.content:
The evening was pretty uneventful, you were actually getting very bored, all you could do was eat and nap and look forward to milking. To pass the time you made a game out of swooshing away fly's with his tail as you ate grass. As the sun set you watched the family all head in the house, heard the TV going, laughter and talking. I miss everybody a lot! I can't wait for this thing to be over with. As the night went on you found a nice grassy spot under a tree and slept for awhile. You woke up looked up at the moon and stars and began eating again. In this boredom you just ate and didn't think about anything, just how good the grass tasted. The more you did this the more natural it felt. The sun starts to peak up over the horizon. Usually you would admire a sunrise like this, but today all you can think about is eating and being milked to alleviate the pain in your udder. Seeing the Bull stepping out of the barn you let out a low long mooooo as your thoughts drift from feeding to the joys of being breed. You let out a mooooo again wanting the bull to satisfy some ancient hunger your mind did not fully grasp. Just then you saw somebody approaching the barn. This broke the hypnotic spell of the bull as thoughts of relief and joys of a good milking filled your mind.
Moving as fast as your aching udders would let you trying to get ahead of the other cows into the barn. Pushing ahead of the rest you were first in the milking stall.
"My girl! You are a whole new cow. It was almost impossible to get you in the stall a couple days ago," your mother says in amazement.
Suddenly you snapped to, you realize since last night you fell into Betsy normal routine you are not sure when it started, but you must not let it continue, no matter how natural it felt. Just as you came to that realization your mind began to fog from the bliss of milking. This will be what you miss most when you go back to your old body. All thoughts drift from your mind as you enjoy the blissful lactation induced state.
Your mind is in such a fog that you didn't notice Julie and your old body sneaking down from the hay loft holding hands as they slinked away before they got caught.

You slowly came down from your milking induced euphoria as your mom finished up, you mooooed for her continue. "All done girl! Besides Katy will be out soon for your training." she slapped you in the rump and sent you out of the stall as the next cow quickly filled your space.

As you walked back into the pasture you started to panic. It was like your human mind was disconnecting or you were using Betsy thought process so much you were forgetting how to use yours. Terror started to grip you, you shook your head, your instincts were to run. You fought your instincts fearing if you ran you might completely loose yourself and become Betsey.Just then you saw...... Waiting for you.
125331111211.title: Morning arrives without further incidents.

choices: Another day as Betsy the cow.
1253311112111.content:
Katy called for you as she stood by the gate. "Come on Betsy, time to go over the routine!"

You gathered your thoughts and began walking over to the gate. As your Mom was returning Daisy to the pasture, she stopped to compliment Katy on her work with their prize cow. "You're going to win the competition for sure! Betsy's always been a prize winning cow and now she has the attitude to go along with it.", she said as she smiled and put her arm on Katy's shoulder.

After your Mom headed back to milk Maggie, your sister whispered in your ear. "You seem to be adjusting quite well. What we need to do is simple for the most part. We just need to make sure you have good posture when presenting yourself to the judges. They will be examining your udder quite a bit, so try not to let that excitement get to you too much.", said Katy with a wink. "Is everything okay so far?"

"Mooooo....", you said. You wanted to tell her about your instincts taking over, but that was a little hard to do given your inability to talk.

"Don't worry about that bull, Buster. I won't think any less of you if you'd like to let him have his way with you.", said Katy. "It's natural for your Body and you're in heat in case you haven't figured that out for yourself. You should enjoy your experience a little before we head to the fair. The bull is on loan with us for a few weeks. Don't worry, I saw Julie run off somewhere with your old body. She's been having fun with your body, so it's only fair that you have some fun yourself."

"Wait, what!?", you thought. "Betsy's having all the fun and I'm stuck here learning how to be a good show cow." This concerned you quite a bit. "What if Betsy refuses to trade back? Can they trick her into doing it? After all, she doesn't know about the transfer device, or does she?", you pondered as Katy led you to the field.

After a fairly easy run through of what was expected of you, Katy patted you on the nuzzle and gave you an apple.

"Mmmm... my favorite!", you thought as you took the apple into your mouth and chewed it up. "Actually, I should say Betsy's favorite. I need to keep things under control today. I have to keep better focus so I don't end up in cow mode again. I want to keep her thoughts and instincts from mixing in."

"Okay there girl, I'm going to take you back to the pasture. Try to have a little fun and get into character", said Katy as she rubbed your back. "Besides, Dad might think there's something wrong with you if you're not interested in getting mounted by the bull. There are other ways to get the results he's after, but I promise you that they aren't as much fun.", she said with a wink.

As the day wore on, your boredom increased. It wasn't until mid day that your curiosity got the better of you and you wandered over to the bull who was happily munching on the grass. Looking around the farm, you didn't see anyone around. Mom had to run out for groceries with Tara in tow, your Dad was running errands in the truck, and you saw no signs of Katy or Julie.

The closer that you got to the bull, the more excited you became. The musky smell became much more intoxicating as you approached. You were right by Buster now as you let out a soft moo and turned around to give him easier access. You felt like your heart was going to explode, but you knew that you were beyond the point of no return. "Best go along for the ride now!", you thought as you tried to convince yourself that it was for the best.

The large bull sniffed your rear and with his powerful back legs, lifted his front up to mount his eager mate. It was only moments before he found his target and started pumping away.

"MoooooOOOOOooooooooOOOOOOOOOO!", forced it's way out of your large, thick lips. Your mind blanked as the euphoric feelings washed through it. "Oh... OOOOOOO... OH MY GOD!", you thought as the orgasm hit you. Your knees felt week as sexual pleasure let Betsy's instincts take control.

About 3 seconds later, it was done. The bull dismounted and walked away leaving you a bit disappointed.

Your eyes glaze over as you basked in the afterglow. Satisfied, you began to eat grass and walk around, making sure to stay close to your new mate.

Although the sessions weren't long, they were frequent. The bull mounted you at least 20 more times in the next few hours. You were certainly enjoying yourself. As the bull mounted you, yet again, you looked up to notice three human girls staring at you. After a brief period, the bull dismounted after inseminating his favorite cow. Trotting up to get a better look, you noticed the taller one had an apple in her hand for you. As you approached the girls, two of them giggled and blushed as they began making noises. It took you a moment to recognize the one who held the apple as Julie. It took you even longer to realize that you could understand what they were saying. "Oh my, Julie saw the bull mounting me.", as the shock of the situation registered in your muddled brain.

"Wow Betsy, looks like you are enjoying yourself.", said Julie as she looked deeply into your large cow eyes. "Still with us Daryl?", she whispered. "Moo three times if you can understand me."

After you mooed three times, relief washed across Julie's face. "Thought we lost you there for a minute. Well you're a good sport for sticking with it! I thought we'd at least give you the chance to change your mind. I'll have to think of an extra special reward for you once you're back to your old body! This new perspective might be good for you.", said Julie with a wink.

"I think you've already given him his special rewards. I saw you and...", Katy began to say before Julie elbowed her stiffly in the side.

"OH NO!", you thought. They gave me an out and I was too out of it to understand them. Looks like I'm stuck until after the fair. If I'm not careful, I'm going to be content with being milked and birthing cows for the rest of my days."

Although he wanted to blame his instincts for taking over, he finally admitted to himself that it was his human mind that was curious. "It's getting easier to slip into the roll of Betsy, but I am still able to snap back to human thinking with just a little effort. That was more me wanting to feel pleasure than Betsy wanting to reproduce.", he thought as he went back to join the herd. "Well, now that they saw me, I don't have to worry about hiding the act.", you thought as you stared at the bull. "What the hell. Since I don't have anything better to do..."

You walk over to your mate so he can find you once he's rested a bit. Maybe if I start acting more like Betsy, they'll get worried and ask me again if I'd like to switch back. That shouldn't be hard to do." you thought as you relaxed your mind and let more primitive thoughts guide your actions for a while. You have to admit, it's very relaxing and erotic to slip into Betsy's thoughts. "What's the worst that can happen? When they change me back, I'll get my human mind back anyways. I can snap out of it anytime I want to."
1253311112111.title: Katy

12533111121112.content:
Another day passes as you wander through the pasture. You've become the bull's favorite cow and have lost track of how many times you've been mounted. You're really not sure what day it is, but you believe that the fair is coming up any day now. It's another lazy day for you as you pull out another tuft of grass and chew at it.

It was about mid day when Julie called you over to the gate. You quickened your pace as you noticed her waving an apple in the air.

"Okay Daryl, I think it's time to swap you back.", whispered Julie in your large ear.

You looked at her with a very confused look on your face. "But Katy needs me for the competition. What's going on?", you thought.

Noticing the hesitation, Julie smiled. "You're Dad is planning on selling you at the fair once the competition is done. He made a deal with a farmer across town for your sale. The offer was too good to pass up since the farmer even agreed to give your family your first calf. I figured that there was not going to be a better time to make the swap. Your family is out for a while running errands. Katy wanted me to take you to the machine."

Julie opened the gate and without a moment's hesitation, you walked up to the secret room. "I'll kind of miss this life a bit.", you thought. "It was an interesting vacation, but I don't want to live the rest of my days as a dairy cow."

Julie fumbled at the door a moment before it swung open. As you walked toward the machine, you noticed that your former body was already in the pod. Upon further inspection, you noticed that the door was barred shut. Your old body was pounding on the door, but you couldn't hear what he was saying.

"It's probably best that we didn't wait any longer.", said Julie. "Betsy was a little reluctant to swapping back. Seems that being a teenage boy is preferable to a dairy cow. After all, she doesn't remember being a cow in the first place."

"Well, the first thing that I'm going to do is take a long shower.", you thought as she placed the device on your head. As Julie walked over to start the machine, you stared at Betsy pounding on the glass. The sound proof pod made it impossible to hear her. "Poor girl thinks that she was really me. It must be a little frightening."

After a minute or so, you noticed that she was frantically pointing at herself and mouthing some word. "What is she saying? Joo Lee? Julie? Oh no, what the..."

It was then that you felt the familiar pull as your mind was sucked out of your body. As you slowly opened your eyes, you saw your old hands in front of your face. You were back in your old body. You clumsily lifted your hands to your face and were relieved to feel your old face. Standing up, you went to open the door, but you noticed that it was still locked.

Julie was leading Betsy back to the pasture already. It seemed that she was having a difficult time with her as she pulled sharply on the harness.

"Wait a sec.", you thought as your hazy mind started thinking clearly. "Was that Julie? If it was, that would mean..."

Minutes passed as you realized your predicament. Julie slid back into the room, smiling at you. Seeing the sow in tow certainly didn't make you feel any better. As she hooked up the device to the sow, you tried desperatly to get her attention. "Let me out of here! Please Betsy!", you pleaded.

Moments later, Julie's body flipped the switch as your mind was sucked out of your body yet again. Moments later, you felt the hard floor underneath your stubby legs. Although your new body felt strange, you were a little more comfortable walking on four legs versus two.

"What a cute little piggy you make!", said Julie's body as she patted you on the head. "Guess I have a little explaining to do. You see, Julie wanted to switch with your original body for a day. She was very, uh, persuasive.", said Betsy with a smile. Once we switched, my old memories came back to me and I remembered my original self. I decided that I would like to stay a little longer than I originally planned, but I knew she would want to swap back after our little adventure had run it's course."

You tried to protest, but the only thing that came out was a loud "Oink... Squeel... Snort!"

"Don't worry little Piggy! Tara takes good care of her pets! After all, your a breeding pig and not meant to be bacon.", said Betsy with a gentle tone. I know you had fun in my old body. I'm sure you'll enjoy yourself in this body as well. Don't worry, although I want to see what being human is all about, I do want to swap back to my old body after the fair. Also, the whole story about seling you to the farmer was just an act. I'll swap back once the fair is over. I do miss being a cow, especially now that I have some better company."

"Oink... Oink...", was all that you could manage.

"I explained everything to Julie. She knows what body you're in right now. I'll go back to my body willingly when the time comes. Katy will eventually swap "you" back with your human body. The real Julie will take care of the swaps once she's able to talk again. Until then, it's time to get your human body out of here before he comes to."

Julie walked the new Daryl out to the house. After a brief period of time, she came back for you and guided you towards your new pen.

"Have fun Sally! She said as she closed the gate behind you. As you watched her walk away, you heard a snort from behind you. The boar nudged his nose into your rear and rubbed up against your side.

"Well, at least I have some company.", you thought as you rolled in the mud to try to cool off.
12533111121112.title: Another day as Betsy the cow.

choices: Loaded on a truck for the fair
125331111211121.content:
"I should have never agreed to this!", you thought as Tara threw some slop into your pen. Realizing that you were very hungry, you pushed at the boar to get at the food. The food actually tasted quite good and you chowed down, trying not to think about it's contents.

"Sally! You're hogging the food. Let Simon have some.", scolded Tara as she shook her finger.

It wasn't long before you noticed the pig's instincts were coming to the surface. "I wonder if pigs really have 30 minute orgasms?", you thought as you looked at your mate. The close proximity to the boar was sending a tingle down your spine. After Tara walked away, the boar was sticking his nose in your flanks again. The thought of the boar mounting you was too tempting. You couldn't believe that you were in this position, but decided to let your new instincts take over. After all, what else did you have to do to pass the time.

The boar was a bit more patient than the bull. He was really getting you worked up by the time he finally mounted you.

Your eyes rolled back in your head as the boar pumped away. Unlike the bull, the boar had a bit more staying power. Your humanity washes away as the boar pounded into you. Wild squeals escaped your lips as you pushed back to meet his thrusts.

"Orgasm after orgasm rocked you, but the sow wasn't finished. "This... Is... Amazing!", you thought as the mate showed no signs of slowing down.

It must have been about 40 minutes of pure bliss before your sow dismounted and fell to the ground, exhausted. You went to lie down next to him getting as close as you can before you started to dose off.
125331111211121.title: Mounted by the boar

1253311112111211.content:
"Time to go, Sally! Here piggy piggy piggy!", you here as you snap out of a deep slumber.

"It must be time to go to the fair.", you thought as you stood up and remembered your new status as Sally, the sow. You trotted over to your Dad as he continued to call you.

"Move it girl!", he said as he patted you on the rump. "You're going to bring us home a ribbon this year. We'll also find another boar for you since you don't seem to be getting along with Simon.", said your Dad as he pushed you up the ramp and into the carrier.

"He has no idea.", you thought as you hung your head. "I guess I'm not as picky as the original Sally.", you thought as you remembered your time with the boar. A series of snorts escaped your thick sow lips as you thought about the whole experience. Hopefully, nobody would know what really happened. It would be embarrassing, to say the least.

The days really drug on and you were bored out of your mind. Your pen was small and the only thing you had to do was eat and sleep. The scraps that they fed you weren't nearly as good as the ones you were fed back home. You lost track of the time as the days just kind of ran together.

Finally, the day of the competition was here. You recognized Tara amassed she approached your cramped stall. She was carrying an apple.

"Sally!", said Tara as she held out the apple for you.

You greedily took the apple from her hand and rubbed up against it.

"Ready girl? We're bringing home first place for sure", said Tara with a big smile.

"Let's get this over with so I can get back to my old self.", you thought. "She's right though. We are bringing home first place.", you thought as you proudly trotted behind your sister to the competition.
1253311112111211.title: Loaded on a truck for the fair

12533111121112111.content:
The competition was a success! You been with pride as you stare at the first place ribbon that hangs over your new, slightly larger pen. They moved you to a better location so all the attendees could see the prize winning pig. You were starting to really enjoy all of the extra attention. Finally, the fair was coming to a close and it was time to head back.

You saw your father discussing something with another farmer. After a short time, they shook hands and he began walking toward your pen. As he led you to the truck, you noticed that you were being loaded into a different truck. You began to grunt nervously.

"Easy there Sally! We're sending you to the Carter's farm for a bit. They're going to introduce you to their prize winning boar. We'll have you and the piglets back in no time.", said your father.

"PIGLETS!? Oh no, nonononoooo! This is not good! Not good at all!", you thought as you tried to escape your Father's grasp. "I don't want to be a mother!"

It was no use, however. The gate closed and your fate, at least for the next few months, was sealed. You looked back, only to see your Father and Tara waving goodbye.

"See you soon Sally! You're piglets will be sooooo cute!", exclaimed Tara.
12533111121112111.title: You win first place!

125331111211121112.content:
You had plenty of time to think of your predicament on the way to your new, temporary home. "It could be worse.", you thought. I'll eventually make it back. It's not like they're selling me for the bacon.", you thought as you shuddered. "I am premium stock."

The thought of coupling with another boar wasn't entirely unpleasant. However, the thought of being a mother and giving birth was terrifying.

The farmer, after speaking very softly to you, led you to your new pen. You saw your new mate as he marched you to your new fate. Your body betrayed your thoughts as the intoxicating smell coming from the large, handsome boar, got your attention. A tingle of excitement ran through you body. Your sow instincts were not going to be ignored.

"No use fighting this. It's going to happen anyways so I might as well get it over with.", you think as you pretend, at least to yourself, that the thought of getting mounted again doesn't excite you.

The farmer closes the gate behind you and watches to see how the interaction will play out. The lack of privacy doesn't seem to dull your interest in the boar as your heart races.
125331111211121112.title: Arriving at the farm

1253311112111211122.content:
You wait anxiously as the boar approaches you. You slowly turn around to give the boar better access.

Nature takes it's course as the large male begins rubbing against you. Your instincts take over entirely as you snuggle against the magnificent boar. After what feels like an eternity, the boar finally mounts you and begins humping away. Your eyes roll back in your head as the euphoric feeling washes over your body again and again. Finally, after what feels like an eternity, the boar finishes and dismounts. You collapse to the mud, happy and content.

You curled up next to your mate and slept soundly. At least right now, you wanted to stay this way forever. You can't wait for round two, or three, or 50 for that matter. You were perfectly content with your new station in life as a breeder pig.
1253311112111211122.title: Boom

12533111121112111222.content:
Farmer Carter did take good care of you, and you ate very well. Just to make sure that the sow's instincts didn't take over, you took to doing mental exercises throughout the day. The days passed by quickly now, as you got used to living the life of a sow. Although you did miss your human form, you finally admitted to yourself that the sex was pretty amazing and helped to pass the time. In fact, you kind of lost track of what day it was.

One day, while getting mounted by the boar, you looked up to see a familiar face. Katy waited by the side of the fence, blushing from the sight before her. She waited patiently for another 20 minutes until the boar dismounted. Embarrassed, but curious to what she had to say, you walked up to your sister, hanging your head a bit.

"Daryl, it's actually me, Katy. Uh, Betsy finally fessed up to her body swap. Everyone is back in their original bodies. Well, everyone except you. The switch back caused Sally to get her original memories back."

"SQUEE!", you exclaimed.

"Now don't worry! She's agreed to keep up appearances until you get back. She's intelligent enough to pass as you. Unfortunately, that's not going to be possible until after you give birth. Dad insists that you stay put until you deliver the piglets. Farmer Carter is an expert at delivering baby pigs and Dad feels more comfortable having him around for the birth. It, um... seems like you're taking care of your part.", she said with a smirk.

"Oink! Oink! OINK!", you say as you try to communicate your frustration.

"Now don't you worry. It could be...", trailed off Katy as the farmer approached.

"Hi there Katy!", said the farmer. "Did you miss Sally? She's a fine pig and seems to be getting along rather well with Buster over here. If she isn't pregnant yet, it will be real soon! I'll let you name all of the piglets.", he said with a warm smile.

Katy smiled. "I'll have to start thinking up some names. When do you think she'll have the piglets?"

"Well, we'll have to wait a few more weeks. If she goes into heat again, it could be another month before we find out. If she doesn't go into heat, then we're probably about 4 months out. Depends on a lot of things. We'll also have to wait a while before we bring her back. Want to make sure the youngins are eating well.", said Farmer Carter.

"4 MONTHS!?", thought Daryl. "I'm going to be a sow for four more months!? What did I get myself into!? I could spend the next 6 to 8 months in this body. I'd better keep Buster interested to make sure this speeds up."

It was an equal amount of disappointment and excitement as he realized that he was indeed, in heat again and not pregnant. "Here we go again.", thought Daryl as he tried to convince himself that he wasn't excited.

'Hmm, I never realised that I looked so damned fine before.'

         You took an involuntary step back as your former face grinned almost lecherously at you.

         'I mean, I always suspected,' your old body continued. 'But seeing it from the outside, I know now that it's just a fact.'

         You realised then that the amnesia had faded. It was Tina, fully cognisant and in control of your body. She smirked as your eyes widened in shock, then pulled out a pack of cigarettes and in one deft movement, removed one from the pack, lit it and exhaled. She smirked harder as you let out a gasp and then offered no resistance when you pulled her into the house and slammed the door shut.

         'You can't smoke in my body! What if my '

         Tina looked at the smouldering cigarette in her fingers, 'I mean, clearly I can. I think you mean to say I "shouldn't smoke" in your body.'

All that chemistry in my brain which caused me to be angry, sociopathic, unbalanced, whatever, it didn't come along for the transfer. Just the mind. My mind is in a pristine environment and has its chance to shine, whereas yours, on the other hand, well, the case may glitter but the contents inside are rotten the whole way through.'

         You watched from your position on the floor as she stepped towards the door way. As she put her hand on the handle, she turned to you and said, 'I watched you with my kids today. Spying. My memories came back pretty fast and I was angry with you, so I stormed over and then when I saw you with them, I was furious, because, who the fuck did you think you were doing all that with my kids, but then, I always hated them, you know. The kids, I mean. Felt they tied me down, that they were mistakes, the whole bunch of them. They're yours now though, and for what it's worth, you'll be a better mother to them than I was. You know, so long as your mind can cope with my broken brain.' She gave a smile then left the house with you stilll on the floor.

14.title: Tara (youngest daughter)

choices: She decided to swap bodies with Tara
She thinks they should test it on something else first
She decides its not safe and goes to find her husband
141.content:
Rather excited by this prospect, having always wondered what it might be like to be a grown up (and not be pushed around by her big brother and sister all the time), Tara grinned and grabbed Boots, before quickly scampering out of the machine shop and across the farm, towards the house on a mission to find her mother.

Liz meanwhile was standing at the kitchen sink, washing up the lunch dishes and singing away to herself, when out of the window she spotted her youngest daughter running towards the house clutching hold of that mangy old farm cat and scaring away all the nearby chickens in the process, her face lit up with a childlike enthusiasm that only a ten year old could possess.

"Ah to be young," Liz smiled, finding her daughter's energy and excitement amusing, wishing that she could derive that much pleasure from running around exploring and playing with the farm animals as Tara did. She really had taken to the move the best, every new discovery in this new house or on the farm being like a new adventure for her, which Liz had to admit, made her feel slightly envious. Still feeling like this move wasn't the right one for her, having left so much behind and being unsure of what her place was now. Kyle, her husband had his own job, as well as the farm work and enjoyed spending his days off out in the fields, having always wanted this kind of life since he was a small boy. Daryl, her son was very similar to his father in that respect, also enjoying living out in the fresh air of the country side, having already made close friend's with a young boy named Zack and even gotten himself a girlfriend who lived not too far away. Katy, her daughter she supposed was the only member of the family in a similar position as herself, not really having taken to her new surroundings at all, having always been a popular girl who was very much missing her friends.

"If only I could be as young and carefree as Tara," Liz thought, thinking that perhaps would be the answer to her problems, and would stop her worrying about all the things she was missing out on in the city and just enjoy the admittedly rather picturesque and beautiful countryside around her.

Just as she was thinking this, she watched as Tara, almost tripping on a mound of dirt, headed straight towards the house and a moments later appeared, flushed and a little out of breath in the doorway. "Mom! Mom! You're never gonna believe what me and Boots found!" she cried, dropping the cat to the floor, her eyes wide with excitement.

Chuckling again at her daughter, Liz turned away from the sink and asked, "Oh, and what's that? Not another magical portal into the fairy realm? (referencing Tara's last major 'discovery' in the corn fields)."

"No, it's even better than that! It's a body swapping machine!" she yelped, grabbing at the bottom of her mother's blue, flowery dress, "Come see!"

Rolling her eyes a little at this, wondering to herself what else her youngest daughter's overactive imagination was going to conjure up next, Liz replied, "Oh wow. A body swapping machine? Really?" playing along, not liking to shatter the illusion, "And did you use it?"

"No, not yet. But I wanna!" Tara said, glad that her mother was on board.

"Are you sure? This isn't Boots I'm talking to is it?" Liz smiled, pointing to the cat that was now sitting licking it's paws underneath the table, "And that's Tara there?"

Shaking her head at this, Tara adamantly told her, "No, I'm me, mom. I'm Tara!", not being entirely sure how her own mother could confuse her for a cat, as she explained, "I haven't used the machine, I've only looked at the manual. But I need someone to test it on, so come look!"

"I'd love to sweetheart, but I'm in the middle of the dishes."

"It'll only take a second. Please mom. Please!"

With her young daughter pleading with her and pulling on her skirt again, Liz finally relented, deciding to humor her for the moment and get back to the washing up after. "Oh alright then. Lets go take a look at this 'machine'."

This pleased Tara no end, and grabbing at her mother's hand she led her out the back door and back across the way she'd came, towards the machine shop beside the main barn. Liz, unlike her husband, her son and Tara hadn't really done too much exploring around the place as of yet, and had never actually been inside the machine shop, not thinking that there would be anything much of interest to her there and being somewhat right as the walked in through the door. "Well I guess this explains where she got the whole 'body swapping machine' thing from," Liz thought as she looked at all the old pieces of farm equipment that littered the place, most of which was all rusted and covered in dust. It not being such a huge leap for Tara to make up stories and pretend what some of this machinery actually was.

"Oh, is that it there?" Liz asked as they headed towards what looked like the seat of an old tracker that had been ripped out, with some of the levers and an old gearbox sitting beside it.

"No. It's through here," came Tara's reply as she rushed right past it, towards the secret door at the back that she'd only just discovered about fifteen minutes prior. Entering the room again, the light being still left on from before, Tara then stopped and grinned, pointing at the two large pods before her. "This is it. This is the body swapping machine," she beamed, looking back round at her mother's reaction as she stared at the thing with a look of surprise.

"My goodness," Liz said, having certainly not expected to see something like this, the strange object in front of her looking far from the old piece of rusting equipment she thought it would be, "What is that?"

"I already told you, it's a body swapping machine."

Liz however still didn't buy this, presuming that it was a machine alright, but not entirely sure what kind. Something the previous owners of the farm must have left behind. It didn't look like anything for the farm however, and seemed way more modern and advanced than anything else in the machine shop; containing flickering diodes and LCD screens and God knows what else.

"Can we try it now, mom?" Tara asked excitedly as her mother began examining one of the large pods, still trying to figure out exactly what it was, "I wanna see if it work."

"Sweetheart, I don't think it's actually a body swapping machine somehow," Liz replied, looking back round at her daughter, not particularly wanting to spoil her game, but being a little more concerned now that if she played around with it she might get hurt, seeing as it obviously wasn't an old piece of junk that no longer worked as she thought it might be.

This made Tara slightly upset, realizing that her mother didn't believe her, and so grabbing the instruction book she'd discovered earlier, she marched over to where Liz was still curiously looking and held it out in front of her. "It is a body swapping machine. It says so right here!" Taking the notebook from Tara, Liz gazed rather curiously at it, before opening it up and reading what was inside, getting a more than startling surprise when she realized that what he daughter had been telling her was the truth all along; this thing, this machine was created for body swapping!

"Oh my God," she gasped, looking back up from the pages and over at the machine, being totally blown away by this discovery, having never imagined that such a thing could actually exist.

Seeing this, Tara smiled and folded her arms rather smugly, telling her mother, "See, I told you it was a body swapping machine."

"I'm...I'm sorry, sweetheart," Liz stuttered, still trying to take this all in, being entirely swept up in her own new found amazement, "This...this is incredible!"

"So can we test it now?" Tara asked, her enthusiasm once again returning now that Liz was fully on board, "Can we try and swap bodies to see if it works?"

This question slightly flummoxed Liz, having always been the straight and sensible type, and yet being totally amazed and excited by this discover, just the same as her daughter, feeling an intense curiosity building within her to actually give it a go. "I...I don't know. Should we?" she said, becoming more than a little flustered, allowing the responsible, adult part of her brain take over for a moment, "I mean is it...is it safe?"

"Looks safe to me," Tara replied anxiously, having no such concerns as she began pulling at her mother's skirt once more, "Come on. Please, mom! It'll be so cool if it works."

Liz thought about this, being of course very curious what swapping bodies might actually be like; especially with her young daughter, whom only minutes ago she'd wished she could actually be more like...

1411.content:
"Oh, why not?" Liz suddenly answered, throwing caution to the wind and decided to share in some of her daughter's child like enthusiasm for discovery, figuring that if the instruction manual said it was safe enough to try, then it was safe enough to try. "It might be fun to be you for a little while."

Tara immediately jumped for joy and let out a loud squeal of excitement, "YAAAAAAY!" wanting to very much see what life was like in her mother's body as well.

Smiling again at her daughter, Liz then looked again at the instruction manual, wanting to make sure they followed everything to the letter. After a quick but thorough read through, she then headed towards the main control panel and instructed Tara to get into the left pod, which she promptly did. Then after making sure that all the buttons and switches were set correctly on the control panel as was shown in the book, Liz stepped into the other pod and said, looking over to her daughter, "Okay, sweetheart, are you ready?"

"Yep, I'm good to go," Tara grinned, her small body filling with anticipation as she crossed her fingers tightly, praying that it would work.

"Here goes nothing then," Liz said, feeling just as nervous and as excited as her daughter clearly was, as she reached over and pressed the big red button beside her.

A matter of seconds later, the machine began to hum, the sound growing impressively louder and louder until it abruptly stopped and a huge flash of blinding white light suddenly shot out from the pods, filling the entire room for a second before quickly vanishing, leaving both mother and daughter breathing heavily in the pods, unsure of what exactly they'd just seen.

Tara was the first to emerge, finding that her vision was slightly blurry from the bright light and that her senses were a little on the peculiar side. The first thing she did notice as they began to return to her, and as she stood up was both a heavy weight pulling at her chest and a few, long strands of dark red hair that had fallen across her eyes; Tara's hair having always been a light strawberry blond color which she tied back in bunches. "Oh wow..." she whispered, grabbing for the hair, discovering her mother's deeper, more mature voice coming from her mouth. "It worked! Oh my God, IT WORKED" she suddenly squealed, gazing first at her much larger, older looking hands, complete with wedding and engagement ring decorating a finger and much longer, prettier looking nails.

Jumping up out of the pod, feeling her much larger, heavier body jiggle and bounce in places she'd never even imagined before, utterly amazed and dumbfounded that the swap had actually happened, Tara's gaze then lowered towards the two large masses of flesh she now had decorating her chest, mostly concealed beneath her mothers pretty flowery blue dress, but with just a hint of their size and shape visible beneath one of the undone buttons. "I've got boobs!" Tara shrieked as her mother's hands grabbed for the two big lumps sticking out from her body, having always imagined what it might be like to have breasts (being only 10 and therefore flat chested), having always admired both her big sister's and her mother's. Now she had a pair of her own and they truly were ginormous, her mother having always been a very busty lady, and Tara was positively overwhelmed by the sensation as she groped at the big, soft and spongy orbs, feeling their immense weight pulling at her body in a way she'd never experienced before.

As all this was happening, Liz too had discovered that she had also changed, being on the opposite side of the machine than she had previously been on, her body feeling a whole lot lighter and smaller, and without those exceptionally heavy weights on her chest that she'd had to carry around for the last twenty odd years. "It worked..." she said, echoing her daughter's sentiments as she sat in the pod patting at her slender frame, hearing Tara's youthful prepubescent voice coming from her mouth, before quickly jolting up out of the pod to see her former self grabbing excitedly at her body, looking absolutely amazed.

"Tara, it worked!" Liz shouted, jumping out of the pod in a manner she was certain she could have never done in her own body, watching as her daughter (now her) turned to see her own former self looking right at her. "We've switched bodies! We've actually switched bodies!"

Both of them then descended into a mass of hysterics as the squealed and danced and leapt about all over the small room for the next several minutes, examining each others bodies and noting all the dramatic differences there in. Tara was obviously hugely happy that she was now bigger and taller and had breasts, as well as a nice curvy womanly figure that was the exact opposite of her skinny little ten year old body. Liz similarly was delighted to be younger and fitter and unburdened by her heavy chest, finding the fact that it was now she who had to look up at her daughter rather amusing, being now over a foot shorter than her former body was.

"This is incredible, I can't believe I'm actually my 10 year old daughter," Liz smiled as she grabbed at Tara's short little bunches, examining her different colored hair.

"It's so cool, mom. I'm a grown up now!" Tara giggled, looking down at her much smaller mother, enjoying the fact that she was taller now (5' 6" instead of her previous 4' 4").

"You certainly are," Liz said, laughing at the sight of her former self towering over her, finding it rather strange to see (as if she was looking into some sort of really weird and crazy mirror), but at the same time rather enjoying the experience. Looking back down at herself for a second, Tara's body which was currently clothed in a cute little pink t-shirt with a white pony on it, a pair of blue shorts and some dirty looking white socks and sneakers, she then wondered what they were supposed to do now that the test had been successful.

Asking Tara this very question, she gave an immediate and decisive reply. "We should totally spend the rest of the day like this!" she beamed, enjoying very much being inside her mother's body and not yet wanting it to end.

"I don't know, sweetheart. Do you think that would be such a good idea?"

"Yeah, it'll be fun. We can even try tricking dad and Daryl and Katy into thinking I'm you and you're me!"

"Hm, that would be fun," Liz admitted considering it for a moment, before quickly coming to her senses, "but I don't think so. We've tested the machine out and it works. We should really swap back now."

This answer didn't go down well with Tara, as she began to plead, "Awww. Please, mom! Please can we spend a bit longer like this! I wanna be a grown up for a while."

"I know you do," she replied, finding the image of her own body pleading with her slightly surreal, "And while I must admit it really is amazing being young again, we really should..."

Who will she switch with?
15531.title: Sure!

155311.content:
You thing of Tara, and you've always been jealous of her. She has a young friend named Charlie, and you've always liked him, but you find out that they're dating. Well, you can change that.

You could switch with Tara, steal her life and 10 year old man, let her deal with your life, (since you've made bad decisions like prostitution), and enjoy your new life as a young 10 year old girl.

You call Tara and she comes over. She tells you that Charlie is inside the machine, and she falls for it. As she enter's one pod, you enter the other. After pressing the button, you've switched bodies...
155311.title: Tara, Liz's daughter.

155312.content: How about Julie, Tara's BFF? Or you prefer a young lady?
155312.title: More.

15532.content: Maybe some other animals beside the dog and the cat?
15532.title: Animals?

155321.content: Maybe a bird or an ant?
155321.title: Which animal?

info.brief_description: Your Family moves to a Farm on the edge of town and will find a surprise
info.description:
Your family just moved to a large farm site on the edge of town. The place is fantastic it has a large house, a barn for animals and a machine shop. Unbeknownst to you and your family the machine shop has a hidden room in the back. That room contains a lab with a machine with two pods. It is a mind transfer device.

Bios:
Kyle (Dad): 34 years old, he's well built rugged, outdoorsy, strong, 6'2" blond. He always wanted to farm. He thinks it will bring the family together. He went to school to be a teacher, but took a job on the railroad to pay bills, so he's gone too much. He's hoping that soon he will have enough cash saved up that he can leave the railroad, try for a teaching job and farm on the side.

Liz (Mom): 32 years old, she has fair skin, red hair, 5'6", very beautiful; she doesn't like the move to the country even though town is very close. She is going along with the move but wants to change Kyle's mind. She wants to understand her children, but doesn't think Kyle buying this farm is the right solution. She thinks this move will trap her out in the country where she doesn't want to be. She loves her family, but wants more and doesn't know what it is. She wanted to go to college, she wants to travel, but life happened and was married right out of high school to her childhood sweetheart Kyle.

Daryl (Son): 14, blond like his dad, almost 6' and growing fast, well built, smart and athletic. He loves being out on the farm. He is very shy. He and his twin sister Katy are very close.

Katy (oldest Daughter): 14 very pretty, she has long red hair like her mom, smart, but acts like a ditz in school, her mom wants her to live up to her potential. She wants to be popular. She hates living in the country and thinks its hurting her popularity.

Tara (Younger Daughter): 10 years old, strawberry blond, she is the baby of the family, very mischievous, loves animals, and idealizes her older sister. She likes the farm because she wants to get horses and other animals

Rebecca Johnson (neighbor): She's 24 very beautiful, she's Tara's teacher. She has a nice house across the road. She is very wealthy and has a trust fund. She travels with her college friends during the summer. Rebecca and Liz are jealous of each others lives. She would love to be married and have a family.

Zack (Daryl's best friend): He's 14 a little on the heavier side has a crush on Katy, but she would never have anything to do with him since she doesn't consider him popular. Some of his relatives had owned the farm where the story takes place before they left town mysteriously

Julie (Katy's friend): very popular, but comes from a horrible home life, so she stays over when ever she can. She has a crush on Daryl. She would love to have a normal life.

Mary (Daryl's girlfriend): she is athletic, very beautiful, but very bitchy and full of herself. Her father wanted a boy and pushed her into athletics. Daryl's family hates her.

Spike (family dog) she is part husky and part German Shepard looks more like a husky with blue eyes. Very protective of the family

Boots (farm cat): This cat was here when the family moved in. She acts very weird for a cat

Feel free to add more characters.
